familyMemberEthics.description: Another asset of Jared Kushner's, LW Investors, LLC, is reportedly invested in Leeds Equity Partners. However, Leeds Equity Partners is not included in his 2017 financial disclosure. Because the investment vehicle reportedly has been divested, this record is categorized as a resolved potential conflict of interest.
familyMemberEthics.business: Leeds Equity Partners IV, LP; New York, NY
